[(r'treatment$','Treatment'),(r'therapy$','Treatment'),(r'hospital$','Hospitalization'),(r'hospitalization$','Hospitalization'),(r'hospitalised$','Hospitalization'),(r'hospitalized$','Hospitalization'),(r'admission$','Hospitalization'),(r'admit$','Hospitalization'),(r'admitted$','Hospitalization'),(r'admited$','Hospitalization'),(r'report$','Administration'),(r'reporting$','Administration'),(r'first$','Count'),(r'1st$','Count'),(r'second$','Count'),(r'2nd$','Count'),(r'third$','Count'),(r'3rd$','Count'),(r'fourth$','Count'),(r'fifth$','Count'),(r'5th$','Count'),(r'sixth$','Count'),(r'6th$','Count'),(r'seventh$','Count'),(r'7th$','Count'),(r'eighth$','Count'),(r'8th$','Count'),(r'ninth$','Count'),(r'9th$','Count'),(r'tenth$','Count'),(r'10th$','Count'), (r'dose$', 'DoseIndicator'),(r'expiration$', 'Expiration'), (r'expiry$', 'Expiration'),(r'exp.$', 'Expiration'), (r'exp$', 'Expiration'), (r'inch$', 'Unit'), (r'inches$', 'Unit'),(r'vax1$', 'Vaccine'),(r'vax2$', 'Vaccine')]
